comment: Closed general form of ~ strndxid . Both sides are equal to ` ( F `` A ) ` by ~ bj-evalid and ~ bj-evalval respectively, but ~ bj-evalidval adds something to ~ bj-evalid and ~ bj-evalval in that ` Slot A ` appears on both sides. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Dec-2021.)
